original_title: Longer - A Look At Joel Tudor Surfing
overview: Originally released in 1999, 'Longer' is a classic American surf movie focusing on a certain Joel Tudor. J brother has a masterful film makers eye, particularly when it comes to his pal, Tudor. Longer captures Mr. T on discs, eggs, guns, and tanks at spots around the globe. The footage, gathered over several years, offers a unique look at Joel's growth as a surfer and his choice of equipment, and the wave quality have not been seen like this before
title: Longer - A Look At Joel Tudor Surfing
